entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @SeanParnellUSA Trump’s musings: Hit them a little when you put them in the police car. Coronavirus will disappear, only have one American infected. Coronavirus is a hoax. We can sacrifice older Americans if they get infected and die. Get me to the bunker & build my wall around the White House!
